attributes.action: To reduce the cost of Council Tax by 20%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the current situation of the country we feel the council tax should be reduced to help with people financial situation. And this should apply to everyone companies, home owners and lodgers. The cost just keep going up and will this year again for everyone

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
